name: api_v1_beyblades
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool beyblade_api.
Tool description: A Beyblade API, providing access to information about various Beyblades, their product information, parts and other related data
API description: Fetches a list of Beyblades from the API with optional offset and limit parameters.

offset.description: The number of Beyblades to skip.

limit.description: The maximum number of Beyblades to retrieve.
